sponsor: State University of New York at Buffalo
briefTitle: Cardioprotective Benefits of Carvedilol-CR or Valsartan Added to Lisinopril
officialTitle: Cardioprotective Benefits of Carvedilol-CR or Valsartan Added to Lisinopril
summary: 14-week single blind, double baseline, forced-titration, cross-over comparison of the cardiac benefits of Coreg CR compared to valsartan added to existing ACE inhibition

primaryOutcome.measure: Difference in Resting CTTI Between Carvedilol CR (Beta-blocker) and Valsartan (ARB) in Combination With Lisinopril.
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: End of each treatment period (4 weeks on ARB or beta-blocker)
